entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C

Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -8.2°C

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and early afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High zero with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
